summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the release of the City from an undertaking to clear land, contained in that certain perpetual easement, executed by Emory A. Sharpless and wife; granting a right of way, over certain lands in Snohomish County, for the Skagit electric transmission system, and appropriating Four Hundred Twenty-five ($425.00) Dollars from the Light Fund therefor.
